Reference

All functions

buildImageArray()

buildImageArray creating an Image array from coloured coordinates

compareClusters()

compareClusters computes differential gene expression between seurat clusters

compareLayers()

compareLayers computes differential gene expression between territory layers

equalizeHistogram()

equalizeHistogram image enhancement via colour histogram equalization.

exportRGB.csv()

exportRGB.csv export RGB coordinates as csv.

extractAllMarkers()

extractAllMarkers compute differential gene expression for each territory

extractClusterMarkers()

extractClusterMarkers compute differential gene expression between clusters and remaning barcodes

extractMarkers()

extractMarkers compute differential gene expression between selected territories.

extractTerritories()

extractTerritories provides a Seurat object from a Vesalius Territory

getSeuratCoordinates()

getSeuratCoordinates get barcode coordinates from a seurat object

imagePlot()

imagePlot - Vesalius image plotting

isolateTerritories.array()

isolating territories from segmented Vesalius images

iterativeSegmentation.array()

iterativeSegmentation.array - image segmentation via iterative application of kmeans clustering.

layerTerritory.concave()

layerTerritory.concave layers selected territories using concave hulling

layerTerritory.edge()

extractIdentity compute differentially expressed genes for each territory

regulariseImage()

regulariseImage denoise Vesalius images via variance regularization

rgbPCA()

Embed PCA loadings into RGB colour space

rgbUMAP()

Embed 3D UMAP projections into RGB colour space

smoothArray()

Apply iterative smoothing to Vesalius images

subSetTerritories()

subSetTerritories gets all barcodes associated with a territory from a Seurat object.

territoryMorphing()

territoryMorphing applies morphological operators to a set of territoriees

territoryPlot()

territoryPlot plotting Vesalius territories

viewGeneExpression()

viewGeneExpression - plot gene expression.

viewLayerExpression()

viewLayerExpression - plot gene expression in layered Vesalius territories
